text: Đorđe "Đoko" Rosić (, Dzhoko Rosich, ; 28 February 1932 - 22 February 2014) was a Serbian-Bulgarian actor. He was a famous actor in Serbia and Hungary. He was known for his roles in Aesop, The Truck, Captain Petko Voivode, 681 AD: The Glory of Khan, and Time of Violence. Rosić died on 21 February 2014 from complications after brain tumor surgery in Sofia, Bulgaria, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Serbian movie actors
title: Đoko Rosić
